meanings.definition: A deck on a ship or boat that is exposed to the sun.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered on the sundeck to enjoy the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I like to read my book on the sundeck of the cruise ship.
meanings.sent3: The seagull landed on the sundeck, looking for a sunny spot.
meanings.sent4: The sundeck of the boat was a golden platform under the bright sky.
meanings.sent5: The sundeck shimmered with sunlight, inviting everyone to bask in its warmth.

meanings.definition: A deck on a building or structure that is designed for sunbathing or relaxation.
meanings.sent1: The hotel guests lounged on the sundeck, enjoying the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The apartment complex has a beautiful sundeck overlooking the city.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot on the sundeck and napped in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The sundeck was a haven of tranquility amidst the bustling city below.
meanings.sent5: The wooden sundeck creaked softly as people walked barefoot, savoring the warmth.
